Dialogue.Page: A bizarre world with a clear deliniation between hemispheres.
Signs of intelligent life are present.
A bizarre world with a clear deliniation between hemispheres.
Signs of intelligent life are present.
My Hearthian friend has told me that the civilization of this planet, which had long been fractured into clans, has now been reunited.
During my visit to the planet I met a scheming Nomai in the possession of a unique species of shrub. I took a cutting of the plant for my own studies.
